mapper.select:
SELECT
,DbT3049ShokanJutakuKaishu."yoshikiNo" AS "yoshikiNo" ,DbT3049ShokanJutakuKaishu."serviceCode" AS "serviceCode" ,DbT3049ShokanJutakuKaishu."kaishuKingaku" AS "kaishuKingaku" ,'' AS "zougenRiyu" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanCodeName" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanShitenName" ,'' AS "yokinName" ,'' AS "yoshikiMeisho" ,'' AS "serviceShuruiName" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3049ShokanJutakuKaishu" AS DbT3049ShokanJutakuKaishu ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."hiHokenshaNo" = DbT3049ShokanJutakuKaishu."hiHokenshaNo" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."serviceTeikyoYM" = DbT3049ShokanJutakuKaishu."serviceTeikyoYM" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."seiriNo" = DbT3049ShokanJutakuKaishu."seiriNo"
UNION ALL
SELECT
,DbT3048ShokanFukushiYoguHanbaihi."yoshikiNo" AS "yoshikiNo" ,DbT3048ShokanFukushiYoguHanbaihi."serviceCode" AS "serviceCode" ,DbT3048ShokanFukushiYoguHanbaihi."kounyuKingaku" AS "kaishuKingaku" ,'' AS "zougenRiyu" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanCodeName" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanShitenName" ,'' AS "yokinName" ,'' AS "yoshikiMeisho" ,'' AS "serviceShuruiName" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3048ShokanFukushiYoguHanbaihi" AS DbT3048ShokanFukushiYoguHanbaihi ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."hiHokenshaNo" = DbT3048ShokanFukushiYoguHanbaihi."hiHokenshaNo" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."serviceTeikyoYM" = DbT3048ShokanFukushiYoguHanbaihi."serviceTeikyoYM" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."seiriNo" = DbT3048ShokanFukushiYoguHanbaihi."seiriNo"
UNION ALL
SELECT
,DbT3043ShokanShokujiHiyo."yoshikiNo" AS "yoshikiNo"
--,DbT3043ShokanShokujiHiyo.サービスコード AS "serviceCode" ,'' AS "serviceCode" ,DbT3043ShokanShokujiHiyo."tensuKingaku" AS "kaishuKingaku" ,'' AS "zougenRiyu" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanCodeName" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanShitenName" ,'' AS "yokinName" ,'' AS "yoshikiMeisho" ,'' AS "serviceShuruiName" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3043ShokanShokujiHiyo" AS DbT3043ShokanShokujiHiyo ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."hiHokenshaNo" = DbT3043ShokanShokujiHiyo."hiHokenshaNo" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."serviceTeikyoYM" = DbT3043ShokanShokujiHiyo."serviceTeikyoYM" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."seiriNo" = DbT3043ShokanShokujiHiyo."seiriNo"
UNION ALL
SELECT
,DbT3050ShokanTokuteiNyushoshaKaigoServiceHiyo."yoshikiNo" AS "yoshikiNo" ,DbT3050ShokanTokuteiNyushoshaKaigoServiceHiyo."serviceShuruiCode" || DbT3050ShokanTokuteiNyushoshaKaigoServiceHiyo."serviceKomokuCode" AS "serviceCode" ,DbT3050ShokanTokuteiNyushoshaKaigoServiceHiyo."tensuKingaku" AS "kaishuKingaku" ,'' AS "zougenRiyu" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanCodeName" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanShitenName" ,'' AS "yokinName" ,'' AS "yoshikiMeisho" ,'' AS "serviceShuruiName" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3050ShokanTokuteiNyushoshaKaigoServiceHiyo" AS DbT3050ShokanTokuteiNyushoshaKaigoServiceHiyo ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."hiHokenshaNo" = DbT3050ShokanTokuteiNyushoshaKaigoServiceHiyo."hiHokenshaNo" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."serviceTeikyoYM" = DbT3050ShokanTokuteiNyushoshaKaigoServiceHiyo."serviceTeikyoYM" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."seiriNo" = DbT3050ShokanTokuteiNyushoshaKaigoServiceHiyo."seiriNo"
UNION ALL
SELECT
,DbT3045ShokanServicePlan200004."yoshikiNo" AS "yoshikiNo" ,DbT3045ShokanServicePlan200004."serviceCode" AS "serviceCode" ,DbT3045ShokanServicePlan200004."tensuKingaku" AS "kaishuKingaku" ,DbT3045ShokanServicePlan200004."zougenRiyu" AS "zougenRiyu" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanCodeName" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanShitenName" ,'' AS "yokinName" ,'' AS "yoshikiMeisho" ,'' AS "serviceShuruiName" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3045ShokanServicePlan200004" AS DbT3045ShokanServicePlan200004 ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."hiHokenshaNo" = DbT3045ShokanServicePlan200004."hiHokenshaNo" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."serviceTeikyoYM" = DbT3045ShokanServicePlan200004."serviceTeikyoYM" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."seiriNo" = DbT3045ShokanServicePlan200004."seiriNo"
UNION ALL
SELECT
,DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604."yoshikiNo" AS "yoshikiNo" ,DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604."serviceCode" AS "serviceCode" ,DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604."tensuKingaku" AS "kaishuKingaku" ,DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604."zougenRiyu" AS "zougenRiyu" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanCodeName" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanShitenName" ,'' AS "yokinName" ,'' AS "yoshikiMeisho" ,'' AS "serviceShuruiName" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604" AS DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604 ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."hiHokenshaNo" = DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604."hiHokenshaNo" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."serviceTeikyoYM" = DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604."serviceTeikyoYM" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."seiriNo" = DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604."seiriNo"
UNION ALL
SELECT
,DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904."yoshikiNo" AS "yoshikiNo" ,DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904."serviceCode" AS "serviceCode" ,DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904."shikyuKingaku" AS "kaishuKingaku" ,DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904."zougenRiyu" AS "zougenRiyu" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanCodeName" ,'' AS "kinyuKikanShitenName" ,'' AS "yokinName" ,'' AS "yoshikiMeisho" ,'' AS "serviceShuruiName" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904" AS DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904 ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."hiHokenshaNo" = DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904."hiHokenshaNo" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."serviceTeikyoYM" = DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904."serviceTeikyoYM" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoTemp."seiriNo" = DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904."seiriNo"

SELECT
,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."name" AS "kinyuKikanCodeName" ,UaT0301YokinShubetsuPattern."yokinShubetsuRyakusho" AS "yokinName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanShitenName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yoshikiMeisho" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceShuruiName" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY UaT0302KinyuKikan."kinyuKikanCode" ORDER BY UaT0302KinyuKikan."kaishiYMD" DESC) AS "sortNo" , ,UaT0302KinyuKikan."name" ,UaT0302KinyuKikan."yokinShubetsuPatternCode" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanShitenName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yoshikiMeisho" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceShuruiName" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp INNER JOIN rgua."UaT0302KinyuKikan" AS UaT0302KinyuKikan ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanCode" = UaT0302KinyuKikan."kinyuKikanCode" WHERE ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kaishiYMD" <= #{sysData} AND #{sysData} <= ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."shuryoYMD" ) AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp INNER JOIN rgua."UaT0301YokinShubetsuPattern" AS UaT0301YokinShubetsuPattern ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yokinShubetsuPatternCode" = UaT0301YokinShubetsuPattern."yokinShubetsuPatternCode" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yokinShubetsu" = UaT0301YokinShubetsuPattern."yokinShubetsuCode" WHERE ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."sortNo" = 1

SELECT
,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."name" AS "kinyuKikanShitenName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanCodeName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yokinName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yoshikiMeisho" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceShuruiName" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY UaT0303KinyuKikanShiten."kinyuKikanCode" ,UaT0303KinyuKikanShiten."kinyuKikanShitenCode" ORDER BY UaT0303KinyuKikanShiten."kaishiYMD" DESC) AS "sortNo" , ,UaT0303KinyuKikanShiten."name" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanCodeName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yokinName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yoshikiMeisho" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceShuruiName" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp INNER JOIN rgua."UaT0303KinyuKikanShiten" AS UaT0303KinyuKikanShiten ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanCode" = UaT0303KinyuKikanShiten."kinyuKikanCode" AND ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanShitenCode" = UaT0303KinyuKikanShiten."kinyuKikanShitenCode" WHERE ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kaishiYMD" <= #{sysData} AND #{sysData} <= ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."shuryoYMD" ) AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp WHERE ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."sortNo" = 1

SELECT
,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."ryakusho" AS "yoshikiMeisho" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanShitenName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanCodeName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yokinName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceShuruiName" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri."shikibetsuNoKubon" ORDER BY DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri."tekiyoKaishiYM" DESC) AS "sortNo" , ,DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri."ryakusho" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanShitenName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanCodeName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yokinName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceShuruiName" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri" AS DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri ON ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yoshikiNo" = DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri."shikibetsuNoKubon" WHERE ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceTeikyoYM" >= DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri."tekiyoKaishiYM" AND ( (DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri."tekiyoShuryoYM" IS NOT NULL AND DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri."tekiyoShuryoYM" >= ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceTeikyoYM") OR DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri."tekiyoShuryoYM" IS NULL )) AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp WHERE ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."sortNo" = 1

SELECT
,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceNameRyaku" AS "serviceShuruiName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanShitenName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanCodeName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yokinName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yoshikiMeisho" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."serviceShuruiCd",DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."serviceKoumokuCd" ORDER BY DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."teikyoKaishiYM" DESC ,DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."rirekiNo" DESC) AS "sortNo" , ,DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."serviceNameRyaku" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanShitenName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."kinyuKikanCodeName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yokinName" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."yoshikiMeisho" FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou" AS DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou ON SUBSTRING(ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceCode", 1, 2) = DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."serviceShuruiCd" AND SUBSTRING(ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceCode", LENGTH(ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceCode")-3, 4)= DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."serviceKoumokuCd" WHERE ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceTeikyoYM" >= DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."teikyoKaishiYM" AND ((DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."teikyoShuryoYM" IS NOT NULL AND DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."teikyoShuryoYM" >= ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceTeikyoYM") OR DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."teikyoShuryoYM" IS NULL) ) AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp WHERE ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."sortNo" = 1

select.id: get償還払支給判定結果情報

mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CAST(DbT7022ShoriDateKanri."nendoNaiRenban" AS INT)) FROM rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" AS DbT7022ShoriDateKanri

SELECT
,'' AS tuika FROM "ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp" AS ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp ORDER BY ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."hiHokenshaNo" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."serviceTeikyoYM" ,ShokanKetteiTsuchiShoMeisaiTemp."seiriNo"
